title: AB de Royse777
author: AB de Royse777
created_time: October 20, 2023, 10:02:58 AMLast edit: October 24, 2023, 10:01:10 PM by Royse777
content: Problem resolved!Quote from: Royse777 on October 24, 2023, 10:00:19 PMI got my account back. Long story short, finally I was able to receive the code in one of my old device.Code:My Telegram account @Royse777 restored.Date: 24/10/2023Code:155Z69y6sFmMbJRvV4bdSRvn6ZXDLJ3v7iCode:ID+q+dJWjOR2zlavbF1r8IcXCfb8zrYqWbDr2vx33rhWKdTkUDf++oJggHTlUNueFH/G6RStkqH1hansz0sP3vE=Currently available Telegram contact : @CasinoCritiqueMy regular Telegram @Royse777 is temporarily in unused. I must say I am in great pain for the last two days and today, I am feeling totally frustrated and helpless. Telegram is not sending me activation message for my ID @Royse777 nor sending me calls. The network is working perfectly for everything else though.Until I resolve it and sign a message with my bitcoin address, please do not contact my personal telegram @Royse777 or accept any information from that account.Quote from: Royse777 on October 20, 2023, 10:30:00 AMCode:As a temporary solution I am using @CasinoCritique for any business associated with @Royse777.Please contact @CasinoCritique for any business until further update.Cheers,20/10/2023bitcointalk user: Royse777Code:155Z69y6sFmMbJRvV4bdSRvn6ZXDLJ3v7iCode:HzTvD8A8i6XFDqpj4axObgcXKuAIocKuMelGk+4hvxGyc4ZJ9WWIwyLczS0PlfTue+9fWzVCD/HdQEcqzDP39JE=

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: Royse777 on October 20, 2023, 10:02:58 AMI must say I am in great pain for the last two days and today, I am feeling totally frustrated and helpless. Telegram is not sending me activation message for my ID @Royse777 nor sending me calls. The network is working perfectly for everything else though.If you use Telegram on more than one device, the login code will be sent to you through the application on the other device instead of SMS or call. That's why I always use the TG application on my desktop computer and mobile device.I don't know how Tg sees when someone has limited access, but it shows you as being present recently.

comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on October 20, 2023, 10:19:41 AMQuote from: Royse777 on October 20, 2023, 10:02:58 AMI must say I am in great pain for the last two days and today, I am feeling totally frustrated and helpless. Telegram is not sending me activation message for my ID @Royse777 nor sending me calls. The network is working perfectly for everything else though.If you use Telegram on more than one device, the login code will be sent to you through the application on the other device instead of SMS or call. That's why I always use the TG application on my desktop computer and mobile device.When I try it from desktop it keep saying me that it sent the code to other device but other device or whichever device they have in their log, I don't have access to it. So several times I tried it from my phone to get SMS, I failed to receive SMS, then I tried to receive call and failed too. I was trying all these from last two days. Now today I think I had enough to this warning.QuoteI don't know how Tg sees when someone has limited access, but it shows you as being present recently. I have no idea about this last seen recently.Code:As a temporary solution I am using @CasinoCritique for any business associated with @Royse777.Please contact @CasinoCritique for any business until further update.Cheers,20/10/2023bitcointalk user: Royse777Code:155Z69y6sFmMbJRvV4bdSRvn6ZXDLJ3v7iCode:HzTvD8A8i6XFDqpj4axObgcXKuAIocKuMelGk+4hvxGyc4ZJ9WWIwyLczS0PlfTue+9fWzVCD/HdQEcqzDP39JE=@LoyceV, date added.

comments.author: xLays
comments.body: Quote from: Royse777 on October 20, 2023, 10:30:00 AMQuote from: examplens on October 20, 2023, 10:19:41 AMQuote from: Royse777 on October 20, 2023, 10:02:58 AMI must say I am in great pain for the last two days and today, I am feeling totally frustrated and helpless. Telegram is not sending me activation message for my ID @Royse777 nor sending me calls. The network is working perfectly for everything else though.If you use Telegram on more than one device, the login code will be sent to you through the application on the other device instead of SMS or call. That's why I always use the TG application on my desktop computer and mobile device.When I try it from desktop it keep saying me that it sent the code to other device but other device or whichever device they have in their log, I don't have access to it. So several times I tried it from my phone to get SMS, I failed to receive SMS, then I tried to receive call and failed too. I was trying all these from last two days. Now today I think I had enough to this warning.This happened to me as well since I managed more than one Telegram account. I use both the desktop and Android versions. Sometimes, delayed code occur when you attempt to log in a different/another account. When you request a new code, they may send the first code again, while the second one is not sent. If this issue persists, all you need to do is log out of all your logged-in accounts or try clearing the data in android setting, uninstall the Telegram app, and then reinstall it.Hope this one helps.

comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: Quote from: xLays on October 20, 2023, 10:43:39 AMThis happened to me as well since I managed more than one Telegram account. I use both the desktop and Android versions. Sometimes, delayed code occur when you attempt to log in a different/another account. When you request a new code, they may send the first code again, while the second one is not sent. If this issue persists, all you need to do is log out of all your logged-in accounts or try clearing the data in android setting, uninstall the Telegram app, and then reinstall it.Hope this one helps.I tried everything except not knowing in which other device I have it logged. The latest is, I sent an email to their support about it. Let's see what they reply.

comments.author: Lakai01
comments.body: Quote from: Royse777 on October 20, 2023, 10:30:00 AMSo several times I tried it from my phone to get SMS, I failed to receive SMS, then I tried to receive call and failed too. I was trying all these from last two days. Now today I think I had enough to this warning.[...]This is a shot in the dark, but is it possible that Telegram services are blocked in your country? If so, it may well be that Telegram tries to contact you, but does not get through because your mobile provider already blocks the calls / SMS. What you could try then is to call the support of your mobile operator. They can tell you if SMS are blocked (and read out the code if you ask nicely ...).If not ... In my case, the number from which Telegram sends the SMS (and possibly also calls) was stored in a blacklist on my phone, so the calls and SMS were put through to my smartphone, but not displayed there because of the blacklist. Edit (you were faster than me): You could also contact the Telegram-support (https://telegram.org/support) as a last resort and tell them about your problem. I am sure you are not the only person with such a problem  Hope you get access to your account soon!

comments.author: UmerIdrees
comments.body: Quote from: Lakai01 on October 20, 2023, 10:54:15 AMQuote from: Royse777 on October 20, 2023, 10:30:00 AMSo several times I tried it from my phone to get SMS, I failed to receive SMS, then I tried to receive call and failed too. I was trying all these from last two days. Now today I think I had enough to this warning.[...]This is a shot in the dark, but is it possible that Telegram services are blocked in your country? If so, it may well be that Telegram tries to contact you, but does not get through because your mobile provider already blocks the calls / SMS. What you could try then is to call the support of your mobile operator. They can tell you if SMS are blocked (and read out the code if you ask nicely ...).If not ... In my case, the number from which Telegram sends the SMS (and possibly also calls) was stored in a blacklist on my phone, so the calls and SMS were put through to my smartphone, but not displayed there because of the blacklist. Edit (you were faster than me): You could also contact the Telegram-support (https://telegram.org/support) as a last resort and tell them about your problem. I am sure you are not the only person with such a problem  Hope you get access to your account soon! Sometimes connecting your phone to VPN first and then try to generate an SMS works (only if the mobile operator has not blocked the SMS from the telegram).But probelm is that he has logged in to some other device as well and do not know which is that device, so the sms may never arrive and only the support can help to identify and logout all the unknown devices.Also, I don't you how quick and  efficent is the telegram support ? If thier response time is low, then it may take few days for them to see the issue and  come to the conclusion. And yeah this is a frustration time when you are unable to login to telegram.

comments.author: Findingnemo
comments.created_time: October 20, 2023, 12:02:21 PMLast edit: October 20, 2023, 12:12:26 PM by Findingnemo
comments.body: Quote from: Royse777 on October 20, 2023, 10:52:27 AMI tried everything Try this and let us know if this worksInstall Telegram X from Play Store on your device on which the sim is used for activation of your @Royse777 telegram account. Don't worry TelegramX is not an unofficial app nor a modded version, it's just one of Telegram's official clients and also developed by Telegram-LLC.Once you installed the app, just follow the same login process as Telegram and here you will receive the verification code via normal SMS to your mobile Number when you click didn't receive code for the second time.I am suggesting this only after trying this on my side now on my secondary Android when my telegram session is still active on my primary mobile. Hope this will work.

comments.author: irfan_pak10
comments.body: Quote from: UmerIdrees on October 20, 2023, 11:38:25 AMSometimes connecting your phone to VPN first and then try to generate an SMS works (only if the mobile operator has not blocked the SMS from the telegram).But probelm is that he has logged in to some other device as well and do not know which is that device, so the sms may never arrive and only the support can help to identify and logout all the unknown devices.Also, I don't you how quick and  efficent is the telegram support ? If thier response time is low, then it may take few days for them to see the issue and  come to the conclusion. And yeah this is a frustration time when you are unable to login to telegram.Was going to recommend him same, about using VPN, but it seems his other telegram ID working perfectly fine. So, it’s not VPN or connection issue with his account. It’s probably his mobile network issue, might have banned specific number where to receive messages. Telegram support sucks actually, they never reply you. But he can try connecting with them, hopefully they’ll help him.

comments.author: albert0bsd
comments.body: Checking for some of the default values in a telegram account:It terminates old sessions if those are innactive for 3 montsI doubt that you want to wait that amount of time:But another important thing is how long is your  account set to be destroyed?For fast message telegram is useful but i thinkg that you should keep a second option of comunication with your clients emails is a good one, proton mail can be accesed via TOR and have some good security options.I hope you can recover the access to your TG account.

Other than that I tried everything else including writing Telegram support (did not receive a response yet though). All other OTP works but it does not work only for this specific telegram.Is there a specific number that Telegram use to send OTP? I may need to talk to my cell operator to whitelist it in case they blocked it or possible anything that is causing this problem.I am really frustrated, I don't think I have left any information unread on youtube, web articles too and tried their suggestions.

comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: Can someone suggest the fastest way to contact telegram and receive response from them, please?sms@telegram.org does not give any response at all.

comments.body: Quote from: Royse777 on October 21, 2023, 01:55:39 PMCan someone suggest the fastest way to contact telegram and receive response from them, please?sms@telegram.org does not give any response at all.I don't know if it's the fastest, but apart from that have you also tried the support form?https://telegram.org/support

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: Royse777 on October 21, 2023, 01:55:39 PMCan someone suggest the fastest way to contact telegram and receive response from them, please?sms@telegram.org does not give any response at all.Have you tried Twitter? They have an official account there that serves exclusively as support for login problems, although they are not very active there. You can try.https://twitter.com/smstelegramQuote@SmsTelegram, login help on TwitterWe have a special account that can help you with login problems, @smstelegram. This account is official. Don't be afraid to DM it the number you use for Telegram, we need this info to investigate issues.Be careful, we don't have any other support accounts on any social media platforms.On their official Twitter profile, they are somewhat more active, even giving direct answers to users. https://twitter.com/telegram

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Have you tried using a mobile device to login to your Telegram? At first, they will show you the received code for another device, but after clicking on : the code did not arrive or was unavailable, I can't remember what the statement usually is. Then,  they will make provision for you to get a code using your mobile number. If you have not tried that option yet, try it now and see if there will be any changes, and if that works, you can then log it in to your desktop browser.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: Royse777 on October 21, 2023, 03:46:37 PMYet to try it as I am not on twitter. I will need to try it from Casino Critique official Twitter. Thanks.I have some older TW accounts, with 5k up to 10k followers, they often helped me in similar cases. I can give you access for the purpose of communicating with the official Telegram if that will help.I'm not sure if there was an update on Telegram, but your "last seen" status has changed.

comments.author: Woodie
comments.body: For as long as you have a device that is logged into telegram, this SMS is actually a code sent to your actual logged-in account in form of a pm to prevent unauthorized access and is never sent to the actual number unfortunately. Btw tried to register for a new telegram account and SMS never comes through and I went the extra mile to see if a solution is available on YouTube, and judging from the number of videos providing a potential solution this is a common problem..Those clear storage memory, enable permissions unfortunately don't work ..Your best shot at this is getting in touch with support,  good luck.

comments.author: SmartGold01
comments.body: I think you have to give it a little time more because you might exhausted your login trial since you have been continually sending confirmation codes. Wait for 4 days more or rather try log out every place you login your telegram account and then try to login back, because I could remembered when I was facing little difficulties with my phone so I tried login in my details to my PC and they sent me OTP to my already login devices so I have to copy the code from already existing device to my pc to have access to my telegram before purchasing a new smartphone.
